newsitem.title: SRI LANKA: Sri Lanka stocks seen lethargic due to holidays.
newsitem.headline: Sri Lanka stocks seen lethargic due to holidays.

text.p: A dull opening is expected for Sri Lanka stocks on Friday as investors are seen staying away following holidays on Wednesday and Thursday, brokers said.

"With Wednesday and Thursday holidays, many have taken leave on Friday which turns it into a long weekend," said Sanjeeva Gunewardena of Ceylinco Stock Brokers. "Barring an extraordinary transaction, the index should be flat and turnover low."
Wednesday and Thursday were holidays due to a Buddhist religious festival.
On Tuesday,the all-share index closed 1.45 points lower at 728.
